TEXT: #bHifumi has a special #yPeroroGoods relic. NL #yPeroroGoods has no effect on its own, but you can use the effect by using a card that uses the effect of the #yPeroroGoods.

#yPeroroGoods do not appear normally and can only be purchased at shop available only to #bHifumi. NL You can go to a #yspecial #yshop by clicking on the #ygacha #ymachine to the left of the regular shop. NL Buy it with #yGold, or combine low rarity #yPerorogoods and exchange them for high rarity #yPerorogoods.
